clips.subgoal: C knits the garment while adjusting the thread frequently.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: C knits the garment while talking on the phone.
C knits the garment and frequently adjusts the thread.

clips.subgoal: C adjusts and knits the fabric multiple times.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: C adjusts the fabric and knits with a knitting needle, looking around occasionally.
C converses and occasionally looks around while knitting.

clips.subgoal: C knits the fabric while pulling and adjusting it frequently.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: C knits and pulls the fabric alternately.
C continues knitting and occasionally pulls the fabric, adjusts garment.

clips.subgoal: C knits the garment while looping the thread frequently.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: C knits the garment while looping the thread.

clips.subgoal: C looks around the verandah, converses, and moves their body.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: C converses while occasionally looking around.

clips.subgoal: C interacts with a piece of knitted fabric, adjusting and knitting.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: C adjusts the fabric and knits with a knitting needle.

clips.subgoal: C removes headgear and people in the scene adjust their positions.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: C removes headgear, person A sits on the chair.
